Note:
All previous versions of Reference Interconnect Ofeer (RIO) / Interconnection agreement(s) of ZEEL upto 31.12.2019 stands withdrawn. Consequently, any RIO / Interconnection agreement(s) received by ZEEL after close of business hours on 31.12.2019 shall be invalid. However, any RIO / Interconnection agreement(s) executed by DPO and already acknowledged by ZEEL upto 31.12.2019 shall continue to be valid.

Reference Interconnect Offer (RIO) /Interconnection Agreement pursuant to Clause 7(1) in Chapter III of the Telecommunication (Broadcasting and Cable) Services Interconnection (Addressable Systems) Regulations 2017 dated 3rd March 2017 :

Digital addressable cable television system (dacs) platform
Reference Interconnect Offer (RIO) of ZEE Entertainment Enterprises Ltd (zeel) for Digital Addressable Cable Television System (DACS) Platform for Interconnection with multisystem operator in digital addressable areas to be effective from 17.10.2020
Direct to Home (DTH) platform
Reference Interconnect Offer (RIO) of ZEE Entertainment Enterprises Ltd (zeel) for Digital Addressable Cable Television System (DACS) Platform for Interconnection with multisystem operator in digital addressable areas to be effective from 17.10.2020
For Headend in the sky (HITS) platform
Reference Interconnect Offer (RIO Of Zee Entertainment Enterprises Limited (ZEEL) for Headend in the sky (HITS) platform for interconnection with HITS operator to be effective from 17.10.2020
For Internet Protocol Television (IPTV) Platform
Reference Interconnect Offer (RIO) of Zee Entertainment Enterprises Limited (ZEEL) for Internet Protocol Television (IPTV) platform for interconnection with IPTV operator to be effective from 17.10.2020
